#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i,b) for(typeof(b) i = 0; i<b; ++i)
#define FORR(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i= a; i<=b; ++i)
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define x first
#define y second

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;

const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const int SIZE = 1e5+5;
const ll inf = 0x7fffffff;
int x;
//int mat[SIZE][SIZE];
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int n,m;
    int a,b,c,d;
    cin>>n>>m;
    vector<vector<int> > V(n+2,vector<int>(m+2,0));
    FOR(i,n){
        FOR(j,m)
        cin>>V[i][j];}
        int q;
        cin>>q;
        while(q--){
                cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
                int cnt=0;
                --a;--b;--c;--d;
                FORR(i,a,c){
                    FORR(j,b,d)
                    cnt+=V[i][j];}
                    printf("%d\n",cnt);}
                    V.clear();
                    return 0;
}
